title: hey riot, why is this allowed?
body: this is what we mean when we say damage is too damn high

replies.body:
that frame-rate though 

nasus did a wither on the internet
thats just how the game plays in the replays, idk how to get better quality footage

She has a 3 fucking level advantage on that Jhin. 

**What did you expect was going to happen?**
this is ALSO what we mean when we say snowballing is too easy

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1TsPZeF1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-20T18:03:13.462+0000)
>
> this is ALSO what we mean when we say snowballing is too easy

It... means nothing though. All we're seeing is the results, but none of what leads up to it. It's perfectly possible to melt people like that when ahead.

well to give you a short summery they picked quinn top, auto won lane, used ult to clean up kills all over the map and snowballed and one shot everyone with duskblade and a few other lethality and crit items thats all.

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1TsPZeF1,comment-id=0000000000010001,timestamp=2018-01-20T18:11:32.942+0000)
>
> well to give you a short summery they picked quinn top, auto won lane, used ult to clean up kills all over the map and snowballed and one shot everyone with duskblade and a few other lethality and crit items thats all.

Against an adc that I can only assume built nothing in terms of survivability.

> [{quoted}](name=YokoNomi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1TsPZeF1,comment-id=00000000000100010001,timestamp=2018-01-20T18:15:50.296+0000)
>
> Against an adc that I can only assume built nothing in terms of survivability.

That is what it looked like to me.  There is a problem with burst AD right now, but this is a poor showing of it, because so many things are against you.  No defensive items, behind in levels, TRYING TO DEFEND A TURRET SOLO VS BARON BUFF AND A FAST ENGAGE CHAMP......

As soon as I saw the baron buffed minions, I am thinking in my head *wtf is this dude doing even going out there solo for*, and then I see it is a Quinn coming and the defending adc tries to engage *facepalm*  This Quinn would have won this fight, even if the level difference wasn't so bad.

Quinn top is not autowin
http://na.op.gg/champion/quinn/statistics/top
48% winrate and .62% playrate. 
sounds like you got outskilled :/
i wasn't the top laner, he and the jglr fed her, i was adc and i have to say its kind of hard to kill someone when their snowballing and can completely negate your main form of damage

>he and the jglr fed her

well there's your problem.

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1TsPZeF1,comment-id=0000000000010001,timestamp=2018-01-20T18:11:32.942+0000)
>
> well to give you a short summery they picked quinn top, auto won lane, used ult to clean up kills all over the map and snowballed and one shot everyone with duskblade and a few other lethality and crit items thats all.

in other words "i don't want to say what really happened so let me make up stuff to make my point look appealing"

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1TsPZeF1,comment-id=000000000001000100020000,timestamp=2018-01-20T20:56:49.922+0000)
>
> in other words "go fuck yourself, prick"

ooh insults... and 5th grade ones at that... i am sorry that you have no map presence in the game

>It's perfectly possible to melt people like that when ahead.

yep, and this still happened fairly frequently back in earlier seasons too. Especially in low elo games where a powerful roam champion like Riven could stomp their lane, then roam around and farm kills with no problem.

That's not the point being discussed. You said "this is what we mean when we say damage is too high." Not "snowballing is too easy." 

In order to prove that snowballing is too easy, you're going to have to post a lot more data and information about the game to prove that point. A 15 second clip of a Jhin getting one shot says nothing.
Level advantage and baron buff already work against the player that got melted. No mention of their items though.

Found the match OP had mentioned.

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2697846903/235298445?tab=overview

Yeah...Not sure why you decided to try to solo defend a tower when Quinn was that far ahead of you. Kinda just screams "Kill me please".
